page.title: 03SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: SOCIAL CONCERNS The majority of people love their surrounding area,but think a few improvements could be made.They made suggestions like,taking away all big factories including the chemical works at Four Ashes.The residents find it very inconvenient and they have to use calor gas instead. They would like traffic lights at the chemical works access point on the A442.They also requested a nearer, more convienient bus stop. The traffic is a problem that many people think ought to be dealt with. Heavy traffic passes through the lanes at all times.The residents think that the heavy traffic should be diverted on to another route,even though the traffic has deacreased since the new M54 opened in Autumn 1983.
